price: Ata gdhendnin shtëpi në shkëmbinj, duke besuar se nuk do t’i gjente asgjë,
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
